As a non-custodial wallet, we do not hav: As a non-custodial wallet, we do not have access to your private keys. You are solely responsible for the safekeeping of your private keys and any loss or theft of your private keys will result in the loss of your digital assets.
We take security seriously and have impl: We take security seriously and have implemented measures to protect your digital assets. However, we cannot guarantee the security of your digital assets and you use our services at your own risk.
It is your responsibility to backup your: It is your responsibility to backup your private keys and recovery phrase. We are not responsible for any loss of digital assets due to failure to backup your private keys or recovery phrase.
All transactions initiated from your wal: All transactions initiated from your wallet are irreversible. We are not responsible for any loss of digital assets due to incorrect transaction details or unauthorized transactions.

Limit knowledge and access to the seed p: Limit knowledge and access to the seed phrase to only those you absolutely trust.
